content.title: Financial Health Assessment and Recommendations
paragraphs: The client is underinsured with a coverage gap of Rs. 33.4 lakh, which poses a risk to financial security. Additionally, the emergency fund is slightly below the recommended benchmark, covering only 5.1 months of expenses.

While the savings rate is commendable at 27% of income, the portfolio shows high equity concentration, which may increase risk. Debt stress is currently healthy, and surplus income is adequate, providing some financial stability.
actions: Increase insurance coverage by Rs. 33.4 lakh.
Boost emergency fund to cover at least 6 months.
Diversify investment portfolio to reduce risk.
Maintain or increase current savings rate.
Regularly review financial plan to adjust for changes.
